name: marmoreal (itch) (Valedict)
description:
This is a game that I made for the Godot Wild Jam #46.

Skip intro with Interact.

there's a lot of audio popping. i'm not sure why its happening. the game runs fine on my potato laptop, but breaks my headphones on my beefy pc.
